text: Wendy Rosenberg Makkena (born October 4, 1958) is an American actress. She has appeared in Sister Act (1992) and its sequel Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit (1993), Air Bud (1997), State of Play (2009), and A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood (2019). ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors
title: Wendy Makkena
